name: Almond Brownie
description: A rich, fudgy brownie generously studded with crunchy almonds, offering a delightful texture and nutty flavor.

name: Coffee Brownie
description: An intensely flavored brownie infused with rich coffee essence, perfect for coffee lovers seeking a decadent chocolate treat.

name: Hazelnut Brownie
description: A luxurious brownie packed with toasted hazelnuts and a deep chocolate flavor, offering a delightful crunch and aroma.

name: Walnut Brownie
description: Classic fudgy brownie loaded with crunchy walnuts for a perfect balance of rich chocolate and earthy nuttiness.

name: Cadbury Chocolate Pastry
description: A delightful pastry featuring layers of moist cake and creamy frosting, infused with the classic taste of Cadbury chocolate.

name: Chocolate Hard Icing Pastry
description: A decadent chocolate pastry covered with a smooth, firm chocolate icing for an intense chocolate experience.

name: Chocolate Cherry Pastry
description: A luscious pastry combining rich chocolate cake, creamy frosting, and sweet cherries, a delightful twist on a classic.

name: Chocolate Danish Pastry
description: Flaky, buttery Danish pastry with a rich chocolate filling or topping, perfect for breakfast or a sweet treat.

name: Chocolate Fudge Pastry
description: An incredibly rich and dense chocolate fudge pastry, layered with smooth fudge frosting for ultimate indulgence.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: A warm, soft, and gooey cinnamon roll swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with a sweet cream cheese frosting.

name: Coffee Fudge Pastry
description: A delightful pastry blending rich coffee flavor with decadent fudge, perfect for a sophisticated sweet craving.

name: Lemon Tart
description: A zesty and refreshing lemon tart with a buttery shortcrust pastry filled with tangy lemon curd, often topped with meringue or dusted sugar.

name: Lotus Danish Pastry
description: A flaky Danish pastry filled or topped with irresistible Lotus Biscoff spread and crumbled biscuits.

name: Mocha Tart
description: A sophisticated tart combining the rich flavors of chocolate and coffee in a crisp pastry shell.

name: Noon Cinnamon Roll
description: Our special Noon Cinnamon Roll, perfectly baked with swirls of cinnamon and a generous layer of frosting. Ideal for an afternoon treat.

name: Strawberry Hard Icing Pastry
description: A delightful pastry with a sweet strawberry flavor, covered in a smooth, firm strawberry-flavored icing.

name: Swiss Chocolate Roll Pastry
description: A light and airy chocolate sponge cake rolled with a rich chocolate cream filling, a classic Swiss delight.

name: Swiss Lemon Roll Pastry
description: A refreshing lemon sponge cake rolled with a tangy lemon cream filling, offering a light and zesty treat.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Fudge Pastry
description: A delightful combination of vanilla sponge and rich chocolate fudge layers, topped with creamy frosting.

name: Vanilla Hard Icing Pastry
description: A classic vanilla pastry with a smooth, firm vanilla icing, offering a simple yet elegant sweet treat.

name: Cheese Pastry
description: A creamy and indulgent cheesecake pastry with a rich cheese filling on a biscuit base. A classic delight.

name: Chocolate Cheese Cupcake
description: A decadent cupcake blending rich chocolate cake with a creamy cheesecake swirl or filling, topped with frosting.

name: Chocolate Fruit Tart
description: A beautiful tart featuring a chocolate pastry shell filled with creamy custard or chocolate ganache and topped with fresh assorted fruits.

name: Coconut Pastry
description: A tropical delight, this pastry features a light cake or base infused with coconut flavor and often topped with shredded coconut.

name: Coconut Tart
description: A sweet tart with a buttery crust filled with a rich, chewy coconut filling, baked to golden perfection.

name: Diplomat Chocolate Cupcake
description: An elegant chocolate cupcake with a sophisticated diplomat cream filling or topping, offering a rich and smooth texture.

name: Honey Almond Cupcake
description: A delightful cupcake infused with the sweet flavors of honey and crunchy almonds, often topped with a honey glaze.

name: Honey Almond Pastry
description: A delicate pastry combining the sweetness of honey with the nutty crunch of almonds, perfect for a light treat.

name: Honey Almond Tart
description: A delicious tart with a crisp pastry shell, filled with a sweet honey and almond mixture, baked to golden perfection.

name: Walnut Fudge Cupcake
description: A rich fudge cupcake loaded with crunchy walnuts, offering a perfect blend of textures and deep chocolate flavor.

name: Coconut Tart (Dry)
description: A delightful dry tart with a crumbly base and a sweet, baked coconut filling. Perfect with tea or coffee.

name: Diplomat Chocolate Cupcake (Dry)
description: A refined chocolate cupcake with a less creamy, more baked diplomat-style topping, offering a sophisticated dry pastry experience.

name: Honey Almond Cupcake (Dry)
description: A subtly sweet cupcake with a delightful almond crunch and honey notes, baked for a perfect dry texture.

name: Honey Almond Pastry (Dry)
description: A crisp and flaky dry pastry layered with honey and almonds, offering a satisfying crunch.

name: Honey Almond Tart (Dry)
description: A firm and crumbly tart shell filled with a baked honey almond mixture, perfect for a long-lasting treat.

name: Walnut Fudge Cupcake (Dry)
description: A dense, fudgy cupcake with walnuts, baked to a firmer texture ideal as a dry pastry snack.

name: Black Forest Pastry
description: A classic German delight with layers of chocolate sponge, whipped cream, and cherries, garnished with chocolate shavings.

name: Chocolate Chip Pastry
description: A light and airy pastry studded with chocolate chips and layered with fresh cream for a simple yet satisfying treat.

name: Chocolate Chip Syrup Pastry
description: A moist pastry infused with sweet syrup, generously sprinkled with chocolate chips and finished with fresh cream.

name: Chocolate Cream Roll
description: A delicate sponge cake rolled with a luscious fresh chocolate cream filling, light and indulgent.

name: Chocolate Eclair
description: An elegant choux pastry filled with rich chocolate cream and topped with a smooth chocolate glaze.

name: Cream Puff
description: A light and airy choux pastry ball filled with delicate fresh whipped cream, often dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Cream Roll
description: A flaky puff pastry horn or roll filled with sweet, fresh whipped cream. A classic bakery favorite.

name: Lotus Eclair
description: A modern twist on a classic, this choux pastry eclair is filled with Lotus Biscoff infused cream and topped with Biscoff glaze.

name: Oreo Pastry
description: A delectable pastry featuring layers of crushed Oreo cookies, fresh cream, and chocolate sponge. A treat for Oreo lovers.

name: Pineapple Pastry
description: A light and refreshing pastry with layers of vanilla sponge, fresh cream, and sweet pineapple chunks.

name: Caramel Crunch Mousse Pastry
description: A luxurious pastry with layers of smooth caramel mousse and crunchy elements, offering a delightful textural contrast.

name: Chocolate Mousse Pastry
description: An intensely rich and airy chocolate mousse pastry, often with layers of chocolate sponge or a biscuit base. Pure chocolate bliss.

name: Crispy Chocolate Mousse Pastry
description: A delightful combination of light chocolate mousse and crispy wafer or praline layers, providing a wonderful crunch.

name: Dream Chocolate Pastry
description: A truly dreamy pastry featuring multiple layers of chocolatey goodness, possibly combining mousse, ganache, and sponge.

name: Cadbury Sundae Cup
description: An indulgent sundae cup layered with Cadbury chocolate pieces, ice cream or mousse, sauce, and whipped cream.

name: Chocolate Chip Mousse Cup
description: A delightful cup filled with creamy chocolate mousse and generously studded with chocolate chips for an extra crunch.

name: Chocolate Mousse Cup
description: A rich and airy chocolate mousse served in a convenient cup, perfect for a quick and decadent dessert.

name: Lotus Sundae Cup
description: An irresistible sundae cup featuring layers of Lotus Biscoff spread, Biscoff crumbs, creamy mousse or ice cream, and whipped topping.

name: Pineapple Mousse Cup
description: A refreshing dessert cup with light and airy pineapple mousse, often layered with sponge cake or fruit pieces.

name: Salted Caramel Sundae Cup
description: A perfect blend of sweet and salty, this sundae cup layers salted caramel sauce, creamy mousse or ice cream, and crunchy toppings.

name: Three Milk Sundae Cup
description: Inspired by Tres Leches cake, this sundae cup features a moist sponge soaked in three types of milk, layered with cream and toppings.
